item.title: Once More With Feeling
item.description:
Here is another post to see if I can get it to push to Github. I don't know how well this will work out.
That didn't work, so now I did a git fetch, let's see if it works now.
Boy, this seems to be really messed up.
item.dc:creator: Frank McPherson
item.content:encoded:
Here is another post to see if I can get it to push to Github. I don't know how well this will work out.
That didn't work, so now I did a git fetch, let's see if it works now.
Boy, this seems to be really messed up.

item.title: New URL
item.description:
I've assigned an old URL that I own, readwrite.club to this site. I am not sure whether I need to be change the domain name mapping script as everything appears to work properly.
I have an issue with deploying this, so this is another try.
item.dc:creator: Frank McPherson
item.content:encoded:
I've assigned an old URL that I own, readwrite.club to this site. I am not sure whether I need to be change the domain name mapping script as everything appears to work properly.
I have an issue with deploying this, so this is another try.

item.title: Once More
item.description:
..with feeling! Now this is a second blog post after I brought down the container. Let's see if this publishes.

How now brown cow!
item.dc:creator: Frank McPherson
item.content:encoded:
..with feeling! Now this is a second blog post after I brought down the container. Let's see if this publishes.

item.title: Hello world!
item.description: This is the first post that I have written using the Dockerized version of Ghost and Buster. Let's see how this works.
item.dc:creator: Frank McPherson
